atk-abh02a10:2_1: Idāni tadanantare maggavibhaṅge ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggotiādi sabbaṁ saccavibhaṅge dukkhanirodhagāminīpaṭipadāniddese vuttanayeneva veditabbaṁ.
atk-abh02a10:2_2: Bhāvanāvasena pāṭiyekkaṁ dassite dutiyanayepi sammādiṭṭhiṁ bhāveti vivekanissitantiādi sabbaṁ bojjhaṅgavibhaṅge vuttanayeneva veditabbaṁ.
atk-abh02a10:2_3: Evamidaṁ dvinnampi nayānaṁ vasena suttantabhājanīyaṁ lokiyalokuttaramissakameva kathitaṁ.
atk-abh02a10:4_3: Yathā hi muddhābhisittassa rañño muddhābhisittāya deviyā kucchismiṁ jāto putto rājaputtoti avuttepi rājaputtoyeva hoti,
atk-abh02a10:4_4: evamayampi ariyoti avuttepi ariyo evāti veditabbo.
atk-abh02a10:5_1: Pañcaṅgikavārepi aṭṭhaṅgikoti avuttepi aṭṭhaṅgiko eva veditabbo.
atk-abh02a10:5_7: So ‘‘suttaṁ āharāhī’’ti vutto addhā aññaṁ apassanto imaṁ mahāsaḷāyatanato suttappadesaṁ āharissati ‘‘yā tathābhūtassa diṭṭhi,
atk-abh02a10:5_12: Pubbeva kho panassa kāyakammaṁ vacīkammaṁ ājīvo suparisuddho hotī’’ti.
atk-abh02a10:6_2: no ce āharati sayaṁ āharitvā ‘‘evamassāyaṁ ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo bhāvanāpāripūriṁ gacchatī’’ti (ma. ni.
atk-abh02a10:7_0: Imāni pana tīṇi aṅgāni pubbe parisuddhāni vattanti,
atk-abh02a10:7_19: Imaṁ etesaṁ pañcannaṁ kārāpakaṅgānaṁ kiccātirekataṁ dassetuṁ pañcaṅgiko maggoti gahitaṁ.
atk-abh02a10:8_3: satta sammāājīvacetanāti imamhā cetanābahuttā kathaṁ muccissatha?
atk-abh02a10:8_14: no ce āharati sayaṁ uparipaṇṇāsato āharitabbaṁ –
atk-abh02a10:11_2: sammāvācā ariyā anāsavā lokuttarā maggaṅgā? Yā kho,
atk-abh02a10:11_4: ariyacittassa anāsavacittassa ariyamaggasamaṅgino ariyamaggaṁ bhāvayato catūhi vacīduccaritehi ārati virati paṭivirati veramaṇī – ayaṁ,
atk-abh02a10:13_0: ‘‘Katamo ca, bhikkhave, sammākammanto ariyo anāsavo lokuttaro…pe….
atk-abh02a10:14_0: ‘‘Katamo ca, bhikkhave, sammāājīvo? Sammāājīvaṁpahaṁ, bhikkhave, dvāyaṁ vadāmi…pe… upadhivepakko.
atk-abh02a10:15_2: sammāājīvo ariyo anāsavo lokuttaro maggaṅgo? Yā kho,
atk-abh02a10:15_4: ariyacittassa anāsavacittassa ariyamaggasamaṅgino ariyamaggaṁ bhāvayato micchāājīvā ārati virati paṭivirati veramaṇī – ayaṁ,
atk-abh02a10:15_6: sammāājīvo ariyo anāsavo lokuttaro maggaṅgo’’ti (ma. ni.
atk-abh02a10:16_2: micchājīvato cāti ekekāva virati ariyā anāsavā lokuttarā maggaṅgāti vuttā.
atk-abh02a10:16_5: Idaṁ te suttaṁ akāmakassa lokuttaramaggo aṭṭhaṅgikoti dīpeti’’.
atk-abh02a10:16_7: no ce sallakkheti aññānipi kāraṇāni āharitvā saññāpetabbo.
atk-abh02a10:17_1: dhammavinaye ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo na upalabbhati,
atk-abh02a10:17_4: dhammavinaye ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo upalabbhati; idheva , subhadda,
atk-abh02a10:18_0: Aññesupi anekesu suttasatesu aṭṭhaṅgikova maggo āgato. Kathāvatthuppakaraṇepi vuttaṁ –
atk-abh02a10:21_2: Sace pana ettakenāpi saññattiṁ na gacchati, ‘‘gaccha,
atk-abh02a10:22_1: Aṭṭhaṅgikamaggasmiñhi ekato pucchitvā ekato vissajjane catūsu maggesu cattāri nayasahassāni vibhattāni.
atk-abh02a10:22_2: Pañcaṅgikamagge ekato pucchitvā ekato vissajjane cattāri;
atk-abh02a10:22_3: pāṭiyekkaṁ pucchitvā pāṭiyekkaṁ vissajjane cattāri cattārīti pañcasu aṅgesu vīsati.
atk-abh02a10:22_4: Iti purimāni aṭṭha imāni ca vīsatīti sabbānipi maggavibhaṅge aṭṭhavīsati nayasahassāni vibhattāni.
atk-abh02a10:22_6: Vipāke pana kusalato tiguṇā nayā kātabbāti.
atk-abh02a10:25_2: Ārammaṇattikesu pana sabbānipetāni appamāṇaṁ nibbānaṁ ārabbha pavattito appamāṇārammaṇāneva,
atk-abh02a10:25_4: Neva hi maggo na phalaṁ maggaṁ ārammaṇaṁ karoti.
atk-abh02a10:25_6: vīriyaṁ vā vīmaṁsaṁ vā jeṭṭhakaṁ katvā maggabhāvanākāle maggādhipatīni;
atk-abh02a10:26_1: nibbānassa pana bahiddhādhammattā bahiddhārammaṇāni nāma hontīti evametasmiṁ pañhāpucchakepi nibbattitalokuttarāneva maggaṅgāni kathitāni.
atk-abh02a10:26_2: Sammāsambuddhena hi suttantabhājanīyasmiṁyeva lokiyalokuttarāni maggaṅgāni kathitāni;
atk-abh02a10:26_3: abhidhammabhājanīye pana pañhāpucchake ca lokuttarānevāti evamayaṁ maggavibhaṅgopi teparivaṭṭaṁ nīharitvāva bhājetvā dassitoti.
